name: Go Little Cube, Go
description:
GO LITTLE CUBE, GO

Help the lonely Cube past all the evil and blocking obstacles.

Use your powers to stay in the same position when switching levels to get through to all nine Sphere Gods.

Game was made for the GMTK JAM 2020 and was developed solo (expect for the music, see disclaimer).

Controls:

  • W / S  -  Go forward/backwards
  • A / D   -  Steer the cube.
  • (Arrows can also be used)
  • ESC  - Menu & Level selection

If you are interesting in how I made the game and its code, it is available on github.
Disclaimer: Music was not made during the jam, and is provided by my friend, Nullrate Producitons
